items.value: Bob wants a Joint, help him!
If you bring me a Joint i will give you a good Gift...

Hey Buddy,
that Blue Cow was to strong for me...
now my heart is beating and i would like to smoke something!

Could you may get me something to smoke?
That would be pretty cool!
Sure Bro, i have something with me...

Uhm... no!

I mean something to relax.
Have you ever heard of Cannabis?
I just want something like that as a finished Joint (x1)!

I know there are a few Dealers but there are none in this City!
May you need to search for them...
i will be back in a bit!

Ah how good it tastes and the effect is not that bad!
Here is a little emergency care for you!
Also take this Bagpack, you will need it.

Visit me again soon so we can start with one of my new ideas.
The donut project!

You got: 1x first Aid, 1x Plaster, 1x Backpack

You dont have a Joint with you!
please come back as soon you got one...
